mapper.select: select mp.id, mp.profile_name, mp.profile_nickname, mp.profile_gender, mp.profile_age, mp.profile_etc, mp.member_id, mp.created_date, mp.updated_date, m.member_status from tbl_member_profile mp join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id and m.member_status = 'YES' and mp.member_id = #{memberId};
